Package controller

Class SessionController

java.lang.Object
javax.servlet.GenericServlet
javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
baseblocksystem.servletBase
controller.SessionController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
@WebServlet("/session")
public class SessionController
extends servletBase
Servlet implementation class SessionController. Class that handles the system login and logout.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Ferit Bolezek, Emil Jonsson.
See Also:
